content: Development in Singapore **Millenia Singapore** is an integrated landmark development of [Pontiac Land Group](/wiki/Pontiac_Land_Group), nested in the [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It sits on land reclaimed in the 1970s from [Marina Bay](/wiki/Marina_Bay,_Singapore) with five buildings designed by award-winning architects [Kevin Roche](/wiki/Kevin_Roche), [Thom Mayne](/wiki/Thom_Mayne), [Philip Johnson](/wiki/Philip_Johnson) and [John Burgee](/wiki/John_Burgee). Before the 1970s, the area was open water used by sea vessels for anchorage with the [Queen Elizabeth Walk](/wiki/Queen_Elizabeth_Walk) along what is now the western end of this area. Part of the [Singapore Grand Prix](/wiki/Singapore_Grand_Prix) runs through the entire part of Millenia Singapore. ## Buildings - [Millenia Tower](/wiki/Millenia_Tower): 41-storey Grade A office tower with a total gross floor area of 835,000 sq ft. It is designed by Pritzker Prize laureate [Kevin Roche](/wiki/Kevin_Roche). - [Centennial Tower](/wiki/Centennial_Tower_(Singapore)): 34-storey Grade A office tower in the central business district of Singapore, with a total gross floor area of 710,000 sq ft. Its anchor tenant is Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation. - [Conrad Centennial Singapore](/wiki/Conrad_Centennial_Singapore): 31-storey, 525 room deluxe hotel managed by Conrad International Hotels. It was voted 'Singapore's Leading Business Hotel' at the 16th World Travel Awards. - [The Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore](/wiki/The_Ritz-Carlton_Millenia_Singapore): 32-storey, 610 room super-deluxe hotel managed by The Ritz Carlton Hotel Company. The five-stars hotel is Rank #2 in TripAdvisor Travellers’ Choice Awards for Top 10 Luxury Hotels in Singapore. ### Millenia Walk Millenia Walk ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 美年径) is a shopping centre in [Marina Centre](/wiki/Marina_Centre) of the [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It is a 2-storey retail mall, with a total gross area of 415,000 sq ft. ## Transportation Transport is well connected by [Promenade MRT station](/wiki/Promenade_MRT_station), together with the access to [East Coast Parkway](/wiki/East_Coast_Parkway), [Nicoll Highway](/wiki/Nicoll_Highway), Raffles Avenue, Raffles Boulevard, Raffles Link, Rochor Road, Temasek Boulevard and Temasek Avenue. 1°17′39.10″N 103°51′31.23″E﻿ / ﻿1.2941944°N 103.8586750°E﻿ / 1.2941944; 103.8586750 - Official website
title: Millenia Singapore
